title: Supermassive blackhole-Ultralight dark matter connection
abstract:
A novel proposal linking the origin of supermassive blackhole formation and
ultralight dark matter. Ultralight bosons of mass $10^{-22}-10^{-24}$ eV which
is one of the front running proposal for dark matter could also linked with the
formation and evolution of supermassive blackholes at the center of all the
galaxies.
